Marvin Sutton

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Marion Sutton; Marion Sullen; Marvine Satton
  2. Foster Name: Unknown
  3. Foster Family: Herman Thieman
  4. Location of Family: South Bend, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Louisville, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1897-07-17, Philadelphia, PA
  9. Date of Death: 1/20/1976
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; The Louisville Courier, 12 December 1903; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1920 United States Federal Census; Social Security Death Index; National Orphan Train Complex; Obituary of Elda L. (Thieman) Duerr.
